The Qur’an researcher is that of the Qur’an to remind the righteous because they are intended for it, and we know that among you are lying, so we will be done to them.The Muslims and the meaning are that among them are people who will atone for the Qur’an, and that is, the Qur’an is a great sense of the disbelievers, and they are the same as the people of the believer, and he said: The Qur’an is lying to them, so they returned to the inclusive of the concept of the concept of the saying of the lies, the first and the first appearance.(P-55)
